

### When working with a module 

on the .vscode/launch.json
```
    "env": {
        "PYTHONPATH": "${workspaceRoot}"
    },
```

### How to get a setup.py 

```
$ curl -O https://raw.githubusercontent.com/navdeep-G/setup.py/master/setup.py
```
